document_data.name: Blessed Craftmanship
document_data.mainbody: '''''Blessed craftmanship''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Laduguer]].
document_data.Effects: When cast on a targeted individual, this spell greatly increased their craftmanship and skill while crafting an item. The item in turn became permanetly enchanted.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s, the holy symbol of Laduguer and whatever materials and tools that were required. These had to by physically touched by the caster during casting.
